contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 18, 1857 D Bowling Gala Contest
Bowling Gala Contest 0 Other
bowling-gala-contest
None
Bowling, Bradford See http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc42.htm
The contest opened by all the bands playing "Rule Britannia," after which each band played two tunes of its own selection, and closed with the united bands performing the National Anthem.
First prize, £10; second prize, £5; third prize, a silver-mounted trombone, value £5, presented by Messrs. Townend and Son, musical instrument makers, Bradford; fourth prize, £2.
July 19, 2011, 9:43 p.m. July 19, 2011, 9:50 p.m.
1 Saltaire Band Joseph Rhodes
2 Heaton J. Broadley
3 Pudsey T. Lawson
4 Gomersall William Brooke
Unknown Result Bradford Railway Foundry G. Sutcliffe
Unknown Result Brighouse Subscription W. Whitaker
